ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Collection adventure
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: mlockridge01  To:  Sent: Monday, March 29, 2004 3:36 AM Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Collection
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 29, 2004 3:36 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Collection adventure


> Thanks. I will have to check the halberd that dropped into the bag
> when I looted it. I had plenty of open slots, and it dropped in there
> on it's own.
>
Could be that was the first open slot that could hold that item. Halbards
are big weapons and most bags cant hold them, but if i remember right the
scavenger bag holds giant items and i think halbards are giant. Till you
fill the bag and click combine the scavengers sack acts like any other bag
would.
